text_block_list.text: “WINNING DREAM STAGE” ― The student council convened that day to discuss the upcoming live concert to commemorate the establishment of the world of Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …That concludes the agenda for the anniversary live concert.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Air Groove. With that, our meeting is concluded… Oh, it seems as though the curtain of night has already fallen.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I'm so hungry. This meeting took way too long.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Brian! What's with your attitude!? You're the vice president, so you should understand the importance and significance of this anniversary live concert…!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well… Brian, I understand that things will get busy. Hmm, maybe we should come up with a solution for…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdy!! Air Groove!! We're here to lend y'all a helping hand!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Brian is such a stubborn person! If you need Maya's help, I'll finish it in a flash♪

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Rudolf, is there anything that I can do to help with the anniversary live concert?…Everyone seems so excited for it… So I'd like to help.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Girls…! Heh… Hahaha! The future's looking bright! Our path forward is clear!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Everyone, thank you. Let's work together and push forward to make sure the anniversary live concert goes off without a hitch!
